name: National Resource for Network Biology (NRNB)
description: Developing open source tools for network biology

projects.project_name: Curation Support Tools for the Creation of a Lung Cancer Disease Map
projects.summary: This project aims to develop tools to facilitate the curation of a disease map specifically for lung cancer, enhancing visualization and data integration.

projects.project_name: Optimization of SBOannotator for Dynamic Term Integration and AI Enhancement
projects.summary: The project focuses on improving SBOannotator functionality, integrating dynamic terms and enhancing its capabilities through AI.

projects.project_name: Using GraphRAG for Automated Data Analysis with LLMs to Explore Cancer Pharmacogenomics Data
projects.summary: This involves utilizing GraphRAG and large language models (LLMs) to analyze pharmacogenomics data related to cancer, aiming for automated insights.

projects.project_name: Enhancing the Systems Biology Simulation Core Library (SBSCL) with a Solver-Agnostic Framework for Constraint-Based Simulation and Analysis
projects.summary: This project seeks to create a solver-agnostic framework for constraint-based simulations and analyses within the SBSCL, aiming for greater flexibility.

projects.project_name: A highly efficient numerical ordinary differential equation solver in the Systems Biology Simulation Core Library
projects.summary: Development of a high-performance solver for ordinary differential equations, enhancing simulation capabilities inside SBSCL.

projects.project_name: Development of a converter between SBOL2 and SBOL3 in Python
projects.summary: The goal is to create a Python-based converter that facilitates the transition between SBOL2 and SBOL3 standards, enhancing interoperability.

projects.project_name: cy3sbml update: major fixes, library upgrades, and new features
projects.summary: This project focuses on upgrading the cy3sbml framework with major fixes and additions, aimed at improving usability and functionality.
Development of a library in Julia designed for managing journaled sequences, focusing on bioinformatics applications.
This project involves updating the Cytosnap application to utilize the Playwright framework for improved testing and functionality.

projects.project_name: Web-Based Interactive Visualization to integrate Geneset Analysis with DBRetina
projects.summary: Creating an interactive visualization tool that integrates geneset analysis with the DBRetina database, aiming for enhanced user interaction and data exploration.

projects.project_name: Integrating DBRetina with an LLM-Powered Chatbot for Genomic Data Exploration
projects.summary: This project aims to develop a chatbot powered by LLM to facilitate exploration of genomic data within the DBRetina framework.
The objective is to build an interactive website for VCellDB, focusing on presenting biological data coherently and attractively.
